column2: Document Title: CHK-010-CIV-CPD-Wire faced wall Installation
ITP Description: CPD - Wire Faced Wall Installation
ITP approved for use by: Pradeep Talasila
Reference - IFC Drawings MRP-DPK-080-00-CSW-0033-0-1201, MRP-DPK-080-00-CSW-0033-0-1206 VR 682.20
Acceptance Criteria - Plan position shown on the drawings at the base of the wall shall not exceed ±15mm (refer to drawings for WP locations)
Acceptance Criteria Wire facing units are to be installed as per IFC Drawings and specified schedule.
– Connect adjacent wire facing units with stainless steel zip ties
– Attach grid-strips at locations shown in Drawing 1957 for appropriate quantity given in elevations. Bottom layer of grid-strips to be attached with stainless steel zip tie shown in Drawing 1955
– Cut the half-height panels at top of wall to correct height (refer Drawing MRP-DPK-080-00-CSW-0033-0-1953)
Acceptance Criteria - Cut any transverse wires as required for bends at abutments and wingwalls (refer Drawing 1955).
– Wire facing unit to be in contact with rear of panel (RW01) and side of wingwall (RW06).
– Geofabric to extend along abutment as shown in Drawing 1106.
Acceptance Criteria - Install geotextile between cobble and select fill for all panels

Acceptance Criteria - To ensure compliance with the tolerances specified in clause 682.20, the Contractor shall install stable and permanent survey reference points on a not more than 5 m (horizontal) by 2 m (vertical) grid covering the whole face of the RSS
Frequency - Each course of wire facing installation
Reference - IFC Drawings VR 682.06, VR 682.17, VR 682.20

Acceptance Criteria - The level and alignment of each course of facing panels shall be checked progressively after placement of each course and prior to placement of the next course to ensure compliance with the dimensional and positional tolerances stated in the design. The
– Contractor shall record the results of this checking together with details of any non-conformances and the associated corrective actions
○ Relative displacement of adjoining smooth panel faces shall not exceed ±15mm measured normal to face of the wall
○ Local deviation of the wall face at any location with a 3m straight edge, shall not exceed 15mm
○ the wall level shall not deviate from the specified level by more than ±20mm
○ the tolerance of position measured at the top of the wall face shall not excedd 5mm per 1m of wall height
○ The wire facing walls shall be vertical when measured at the corresponding point for each row of wire facing units.
Frequency - Each course of panel installation

On behalf of Metropolitan Roads Program Alliance, it is hereby certified that the Works represented by the item of work listed have been tested in accordance with the Project Quality Plan and conform in all respects with the requirements of the Contract.
